title: How big was the largest pressure vessel ever built? - Quora

response.answer_text: My first guess was this one, but that’s wrong. It’s the ISS as of 2018.  Image Credit: NASA/Roscosmos An Ohio class submarine is larger at 170 meters long and 13 meters wide.  Image Credit: USS Louisiana U.S. Navy photo by Mr. Brian Nokell - 051012-N-6497N-096 via Wikipedia.
